metadata.name: Isfahan ahmad kashi
metadata.description:
This NFT belongs to this carpet.
Isfahan ahmad kashi
The first carpet in the collection 224 is the famous Ahmad Kashani Isfahan carpet with an age of almost 100 years dating back to 1920. Ahmadâ€™s carpets were famous in his time and today they are among the rare and special Isfahan carpets that are very difficult to find with such quality. This carpet has a red background with a mihrab pattern and an extraordinary color combination. This carpet is a total masterpiece.
Visit https://farshes.com/product/isfahan-ahmad-kashi/
For more details
